name: Interminable
description:
This is a Short #horror game inspired by P.T. and other classic horror games, as such, it will feature lots and lots of walking, eerie sounds, and jumpscares.

You awake to find yourself in what appears to be an endless purgatory. Surrounded by darkness and with only a weak lantern to light your way, you must try to find a way out, if there even is one...

A game made by Deerpyboi
Glowing text by Maker Games
Assets used are from Zeoworks.com

Main Theme by Flying Orion (Edited by Deerpyboi)

Music/audio used are from:
* Amnesia: The Dark Descent
* https://freesound.org (audio/music made by users xtrgamr,syntheway. hinsinger, doty21, bolkmar and a few others)
